title: Status Effects
content:
acrifice a piece of your memories (-2 to an Ability Score of choice which can be cured with Remove Curse) for a +1 stat.

Give your blood to Araj Oblodra in Moonrise Towers in Act 2, then meet her again east of The Blushing Mermaid in Act 3 and help her again.
